title: Revisiting Cambodias Killing Fields 30 years later

tasks.task: Analyze the history of rice farming in Cambodia post-Khmer Rouge period
subtasks: Understand the decline in rice production during the Khmer Rouge reign
Recognize the importance of genetic conservation in revitalizing rice varieties in Cambodia
Identify the role of the International Rice Research Institute (IRRI) in collecting traditional rice varieties before the war
Describe the initial challenges faced by IRRI in restarting agricultural research and development in Cambodia
Outline the efforts to rebuild human resources and infrastructure in Cambodia's agricultural sector
Highlight the importance of capacity building through training and education programs for Cambodian agronomists
Discuss the impact of agriculturally trained Cambodians on the national research system and exports
Examine the recovery of Cambodian rice production, including yield increases and export activities
